title: New Runes, I'm confused
body: This is great, all this new rune system, but, uhm, I have 16 rune pages and a lot of runes, and that's worth quite a lot, am I gonna get a refund or something? Or my runes still count? I'm confused, like, that's a LOT of IP, like, a LOTTT, 6300 x 16 = 100,800 IP, plus the runes themselves :////////// and if the rune pages still work, like they r still in the system, what about my runes? Like r we getting a refund or something?

replies.body: No worries about runes! Riot Cactopus made a detailed post about how runes are changing and everything you'll need to know in order to prepare. First and foremost, you *will* be getting some refunds on some of those runes. Make sure you hit up [**this post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/RlNQkO39-buying-runes-between-now-and-preseason) though to get all of the details.
